case.state: The name's Aimee Matchlock--and when I'm through with ya, yer clothes're gonna have more holes than a bagel shop!
The name's Aimee Matchlock--and when I'm through with ya, yer clothes're gonna have more holes than a bagel shop!
I need new cards like I need a hole in my head!
Ya ain't gettin' any cards from me!
Yer taken these cards over my dead body!
I guess ~cards~. Go me.
Have this card. I don't even need one back.
~cards~ card, 1 kill.
Feh! I'm tradin' the whole lot of them!
Ugh! No groupin' at all! Give me ~cards~.
Pathetic! ~cards~. Now.
Could ya give me a hand, dealer? Literally a whole hand.
Just give me the deck--I'll pick them myself.
1, 2, ~cards~ cards!
I need a ~cards~ shot burst.
Reload! ~cards~ cards!
~cards~ cards. Ya know where ta put 'em.
~cards~ mo' dakka!
~cards~ cards. This hand needs accurizin'.
~cards~ cards, and make it a double!
Cards akimbo!
It's a two-fer!
I'd like a pair.
Reload! ~cards~ cards!
~cards~ cards. Ya know where ta put 'em.
~cards~ mo' dakka!
~cards~ cards. This hand needs accurizin'.
~cards~!
Hey Snow-Angel, I got some ice-rounds too--really good for keepin' the barrel cool. Could I check out yer gun sometime?
Hey Snow-Angel, I'm bettin' yer gun ain't ballistic, but could I compare it to my icehead rounds some time?
I can't quite tell, how boutcha bend over some?
Maybe it's between the cheeks? Ya better spreadem.
Bout time ya came over ta my side, dealer.
Alright dealer, yer off the hook--for now.
Aww, for me? It's good ta see ya had a change of heart, dealer.
Thank ya, dealer. Yer a personage of reason and decency.
Girls' night? Well statistically speakin', ~player~'s likely a guy gettin' his pretend on, but who cares 'bout that?
~player~--if that's yer real name--could we get some guys in here sometime?
Ohoho! ~player~'s gave me some men ta look at! I love it!
Ohoho! ~player~, ya invited men in here? I love ya! I love ya I love ya I love ya!
Wha! Ha! Surrounded by men!? I wasn't expectin' this! Oh ~player~, ya blessed, beautiful boychik!
Hey ~player~, ya wanna hear a joke? Throw this hand and I'll tell ya one.
Oh, ~player~, I gotta joke for ya. Throw this hand and I'll letcha have it!
Oo! I just got the funniest joke in my head. ~player~, if ya throw this hand, I'll tell it to ya!
Now that's more like it.
It's hiiiiiiiigh noon.
Oh no, this hand is terrible! What's a little old me ta do? 'Sides "win" that is.
Overkill is underrated!
Do ya feel lucky? Do ya, punks?
I've gotcha in my sights, ~player~!
Come and get me!
No beatin' this!
I can see yer weak point. It's not havin' my hand.
What's the difference 'tween this hand and one bullet? With one bullet I could strip all of ya guys.
I could make this shot with my eyes closed.
Now I have three steady hands.
Somebody's fixin' ta get exposed ta the elements.
There ain't no way ya got a better hand than this, ~player~.
Hit me with yer best shot!
Hey Snow-Angel, I got some ice-rounds too--really good for keepin' the barrel cool. Could I check out yer gun sometime?
Hey Snow-Angel, I'm bettin' yer gun ain't ballistic, but could I compare it to my icehead rounds some time?
I can't quite tell, how boutcha bend over some?
Maybe it's between the cheeks? Ya better spreadem.
Girls' night? Well statistically speakin', ~player~'s likely a guy gettin' his pretend on, but who cares 'bout that?
~player~--if that's yer real name--could we get some guys in here sometime?
Ohoho! ~player~'s gave me some men ta look at! I love it!
Ohoho! ~player~, ya invited men in here? I love ya! I love ya I love ya I love ya!
Wha! Ha! Surrounded by men!? Well, I wasn't expectin' this!
Hey ~player~, ya wanna hear a joke? Throw this hand and I'll tell ya one.
Oh, ~player~, I gotta joke for ya. Throw this hand and I'll letcha have it!
Oo! I just got the funniest joke in my head. ~player~, if ya throw this hand, I'll tell it to ya!
At least ya can lose with dignity. Wait. No. No, ya already lost that.
Come on, ya guys can still win! I mean it's not likely, but...
I'm feelin' a little overdressed...and I showed up with 90% of my torso on display!
It feels good ta be a born winner, ya know? Oh wait, ya don't.
Sure is lonely at the top...said no sniper ever.
What, ya guys want me ta get undressed too? I'll think about it.
Ya guys really make it feel like home, ya know?
Oh man, it sure is hot in here with all these clothes I'm still wearin'.
In the land of the nude, the skimpily dressed sniper is queen!
Can a dame really feel bad for bein' so, so good?
I'm goin' ta get darlin' ta make me some pancakes afta this. Workin' up an appetite, here.
Guns don't kill people--I kill people. With guns.
Ya like my gun? It's ain't my go-to, but old Guncleaver's hard ta model. This one works in a pinch, if ya know what I mean.
Ya stopped ta read all our text boxes? I'm flattered, but I ain't gettin' any younger. Chop chop!
Ain't even bluffin'--this hand is just borin'.
I gave ya the right cards...didn't I?
This reminds me of the time I held off the entire Shieldbearer army by myself. Honestly, my odds here are slimmer.
Welp, ~player~'s stopped ta read our text boxes. Take five.
Hubby asked me ta wear this cowgirl getup round civies in order ta blend in and not cause any riots. Also somethin' bout protectin' my perfect little footsies.
Hurry up, ~player~. Ya ain't stallin' are ya?
Don't keep us waitin' long, ~player~. We're liable ta get it on withoutcha.
Just throw out all the cards if it's buggin' ya that much, ~player~.
Hey, ~player~! Yer hand is crap! Ya should ditch it!
Patience is for schmuck snipers. Good snipers'll find somethin' ta shoot. Now if only some laggard would swap their cards...
Yer poker face is fine, but yer eyes are sayin' everythin', ~player~. Maybe ya should close them so I can't read yer cards in the reflection.

Hey Snow-Angel, I'm bettin' yer gun ain't ballistic, but could I compare it to my icehead rounds some time?
I can't quite tell, how boutcha bend over some?
Maybe it's between the cheeks? Ya better spreadem.
Dealer, if ya think yer pullin' a fast one on me, I'll show ya who's got a quicker draw.
Ya know dealer, when I showed up, I wasn't thinkin' I was gonna gib somebody.
Dealer's gunnin' for me...
Feh...when life gives ya lemons, ya squeeze 'em in life's eyes. Ya hearing me, dealer?
Yer crusin' for a bruisin', dealer!
Trigger finger's gettin' itchy. Dealer best hope it don't get scratchy,
Feh. Feelin' the evil eye.
Somebody musta cut a deal with the dealer, hmm?

Ya know what? I'm dog-tired of winnin' so much. I'm throwin' this hand.
Ya guys need a handicap. I'm throwin' this one.
Jeez ya nimrods are bad at this! I got myself the worst hand I can get. Watch me win anyway.
Look, I ain't even gonna try ta win this hand. Now's yer chance, ya idgets!
This hand ain't kosher!
Good grief! What's a gal gotta do ta get a good hand around here?
Good thing we ain't playing for guap.
I uh...gave ya the wrong card.
Oy veh...
What kinda cockamamy hand is this?
I hope this hand is second-worst.
I guess I can't get that card back.
Feh...
I'm caught in the crosshairs.
Might as well start firin' now...
I'm swiss cheese, ain't I?
It's target shootin'...and I'm the skeet.
Jammed.
Went and went off half-cocked.
It's like I'm front of a firin' squad.
Dang it, I got cocky--and not in a good way!
My hand's great! Perfect even! Five-of-a-kind!
What's goin' first, Aimee? Boots? Pants? Hat? Need ta figure it out quick.
I guess I'm gonna take somethin' off...Maybe start with the...
Chillax Ladybug, these bullets only go where I tell them to.
Ladybug: I don't miss.
Oh no, Ladybug! My hand slipped! Duck! -- Ha, I'm just kiddin'. I never miss.
Hey Burgerpants! Duck!
Look alive Burgerpants! Wouldn't want ya ta wet yerself again!
Hahaha! Dance Burgerpants, dance!
Hey Burgerpants! Catch!
Special delivery here for ya, Burgerpants!
Sorry Sparkles, I've put my mercanary days behind me. Speakin' of--
Sparkles, I KNOW I can. But darlin' says that was cheatin'.
Sparkles, the one thing I CAN'T hit is "accidentally."
Oh Revy, ya really shoulda kept yer guns. Coulda taught ya a thing or two.
Revy, ya don't know what yer missin' with yer guns gone. You could be doin' somethin' like this for instance.
Ya see Princess Footsie, this is a gun. And the gun goes bang bang bang bang bang!
Oh, ya never seen a gun before, Princess Footsie? Well yer in for a treat!
Well well well, Princess Footsie's never seen a gun before! Let me show ya what they do.
I'm doin' that again!
What kinda loot do Pegasi drop? Kiddin'! Kiddin'!
It's all good--no Pegasi to be seen.
Shorty calls for moar, and moar there shall be!
Back by popular demand! This shot's for you, Shorty!
Aww Shorty, I ain't gonna start lettin' ya down!
Jeez, Nugs, yer bloodthirsty ain'tcha? Sorry, not this time.
Sorry Nugs, not this time. I promise I'll blow yer socks off...uh, figuratively speakin'.
Whoa! Nugs is out fer blood! Maybe next time, Nuggy-baby!
Bout frickin' time!
Been too long since I last got ta shoot somethin'.
Lets get this show on the road!
Finally, I get ta do something!
And the bullet drought...is over! Makin' it rain!
Lemme just make a bullet point list of how bad ya guys are at poker.
I'mma show ya guys how a real woman strips.
Heheheh...My turn.
Ya think ya stripped fancy? Well check this out.
Ooo, ya smarted up all the sudden. But yer still leagues away--check out my smarts.
Alright, nobody move less ya want a piercin'.

Time ta make it rain!
Here comes the thunder!
Open fire!

Don'tcha dare close yer eyes.
Hold your breath, it gets better.
Don't move, Ziegler. Else yoou'll be two types of swiss.
I'm aimin' ta impress!
I'm aimin' for yer heart, Snow-Angel!
Don'tcha worry Angel, no heavenly host were harmed in the makin' of this shot.
Bullet's ricochetin' round yer heavens right now, Angel. Don't worry--nobody's gettin' hurt.
Uh, Korra? The bullet's doin' fine on its own! Eep!
Wait Korra, don't--Ah!
K-korra--wait a--meep!
Kinda tickles...
Oh drat, I forgot ta adjust for sudden changes in local humidity. From the look of you'se guys, it's on the rise.
Chillax, people. If I wanted ta change somethin's diaper, I'd place an order with my darlin'.
Hmmhmmhmmm...
Oh, the look on yer faces...
Deep breaths--ya wouldn't want any unintentional discharges.
Ya better hope I ain't a klutz today...
For yer own safety, please keep yer arms and legs inside yer character boxes at all times.
I really put the "casual" in "casualty," don't I?
Careful--ya saw how shaky my poker hand was--better hope that don't translate.
The first time darlin' saw this, I'll tell ya, he regretted feedin' me that cake!
I spray--you pray!
Wait for it...wait for it...
What, ya think bullets fired in the air just go into space or something?
Once did this ta wing a guy from a continent away. Sweet kid--I'm kinda glad I missed his big dumb head.
They're arcin' at 10,000 feet. Ya gotta give them a sec.
W-wait, I flinched--It's gonna...!
I-I can feel it slippin' by me! It's so hot!
This is the riskiest shot I've ever...
It's coming! I--my legs! It's gonna!
No--not that way! I--!
Uh, Sparkles? Do NOT try this at home.
Keep yer eyes peeled, Avatar. Cause I'm a master of all 8 elements.
I don't need cheatin' magics to make my shot hit. I'm au naturale.
The only thing I'm bending here is ~player~'s suspension of disbelief.
Aw come on, nobody's that innocent!
What, innocent like you?
Innocent? Ya do realize we're playin' strip poker, right?
Aww, thank ya Snow-Angel!
Huh, ya like that? Well...I guess I gotta give an encore!
Glad ta see somebody here's got taste, Snow-Angel!
Don'tcha worry yer pretty little head Flo--I never miss! Never ever!
Aww Flo, ya want a hair cut? A little off the back?
Ya know, I CAN make flamin' bullets...that might be a little too hot.
Aww, Angel...! It feels good ta be appreciated.
Aww, Angel...! Next shot's gonna be even wilder, just for you.
Aww, Angel...! Ya know, I was thinkin' of callin' it quits, but if ya like it...
Ya know, sometimes I wish I was a third-person shooter.
What? Ya thought I was gonna strip my gun? I'll have ya know I can strip it and reassemble it in thirty seconds--with my perfect little toesies!
Bang! I make it look easy.
Hah...so exhilaratin'...
Go ahead and throw a playin' card in the air. I'll shoot my signature on it 'fore it hits the dirt.
Anybody have some tailorin' ya need done? I take requests.
Now don't go tryin' that at home. Yer not as skilled as I am--wouldn't want ya ta hurt yerself. Hurtin' ya's my job.
Hey, no casualties! Hats off ta you guys. Ya deserve it!
Simple geometry!
Gah! That was close... R- right where I meant ta send it, of course. But close.
Whoa--I felt the heat on my neck...That bullet almost...
Ack! I--I, uh, I meant ta do that...Talk about a close shave.
Eep! ...I mean, uh...neat, huh?
Hah! Almost stripped my body there...is the perception ya might have. But yer wrong.
Ngh! The shockwave! I'm so jiggly all of the sudden! Hehe!
320 degrees celsius. 590 kelvin! 610 farenheit! So hot!
Right 'tween my ta-tas! Right by my...ngh!
Wah! Right where I wanted it! Right by my...Oh darlin'!
Ah! Now that's what I call a vest buster!
C-c-cummin!
Gr-grazed me!
A-ahhh!
It touched! Aah!

Mess with the best, strip like the rest.

I'm on a roll!

I am on fire!
I took ya down without even firin' a shot.

Maybe it's between the cheeks? Ya better spreadem.
Ugh, I'm so sticky.
Lots of waitin' when yer not playin'...
I wonder what darlin's makin' me for dinner tonight?
I sure hope my darlin' isn't lonely with me bein' gone so long.
I'm definitely gonna need ta detail clean my gun after this.
I don't miss--I shot myself on purpose, got that!? Not suicidal or nothin', just, uh, thrills for my jills.
Geez that smarts. Nobody heal me--I wanna see what darlin' does when he sees me banged up.

scene.directive: Stupid, stupid, stupid...
I'll need to keep to back roads and move quick...
Gotta keep a look out fer security cameras.
If darlin' found out how stupid I was...Gah! So embarrassin'!
Right, shoot through the gym to dodge the road, then....
Oh, hey grayscale. Just uh...goin' for a jog.
Gah! How could I lose? I really gotta shape up.

Get it? Cause she just got nutted on?
Useful, though. As a distraction. Hehehe...
Gotta say, gotta say--It does feel pretty exhilaratin'.
I mean, I can't see how Moon does what she does....
But this duckin' 'round? This is kinda fun!
Grass 'neath my feet, wind on my skin...
Scurryin' from cover to hidey-hole...
Always lookin' over my shoulder, waitin' to be seen...
It's like I'm some sorta prey animal.
I mean, 'sides the fact I could gib any predator I meet.
My safety word's kaboom. Heheheheh.
Whoops! Sorry folks. 'Scuse me, 'scuse me!

Hey uh, player? That double 4 ain't gonna cut it.
Aw jeez, I can't hold it in any more!
Distractin' idyllic everyday life with my wayward snatch...
I need...to get home... before...oh darlin'...!
D...darlin'?
Sugarcakes? Why are you...
Bedroom! Now!
